text: Margaret, Marchioness of Namur (c. 1194 â€“ Marienthal, 17 July 1270) was ruling Marchioness of Namur, from 1229 to 1237. She was the daughter of Peter of Courtenay (d. 1219), Latin Emperor of Constantinople (1216-1219) and Yolanda of Flanders (d. 1219). By marriage to Henry I, Count of Vianden (d. 1252), she was Countess-consort of Vianden. Category:1194 births Category:1270 deaths Category:Counts of Namur
title: Margaret, Marchioness of Namur
